actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States authorizing the Congress and the States to prohibit the act of desecration of the flag of the United States and to set criminal penalties for that act.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Declares that Congress and the states shall have power to prohibit desecration of the U.S. flag and to set criminal penalties for such act.
